ygData.subject: Re: Strategies and quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I made level 14 and am 1/2 way to 15 as of last night. I have noticed that non twinked varries quite alot by definition.  Cronik is minorly twinked, but only
ygData.messageBody:
I made level 14 and am 1/2 way to 15 as of last night.
I have noticed that "non twinked" varries quite alot by
definition. Cronik is minorly twinked, but only because
a friend gave me a FS2HS when I was 9th or so which I
still use. ;) Evrything else has been bought with
earned cash.

<snip>
>Levels 15-20:
>Weapon: Grobb Cleaver, Brutechopper, Shiny Brass
>Halberd, or Bone Bladed Claymore
>
<snip>
Is it Lyguna in Innothule that dropps the Brutechopper?
What level is she?
In South Karana there is a named wolf that drops a claw
that is a good 1HS weapon. Anyone know what level it is?
Or the Druid that drops the Silvery Scimitar? What is
the druids name?

I have been waiting to go into Guk until I hit 15.
Should I wait a bit more till I get to a higher level?
Thanks.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
14th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
